articles.author: Sasha Rogelberg
articles.title: ‘The frustration is overwhelming’: Soybean farmers feel betrayed as Argentina blows a hole in rural America’s $47 billion soybean bonanza - Fortune
articles.description: China will reportedly buy at least 10 cargoes of Argentine soybeans, further jeopardizing the U.S. export market.
articles.content: President Donald Trump counts U.S. farmers as one of his most loyal constituencies, but the administrations recent move to expand economic support for Argentina has drawn the ire of the agriculture i… [+7400 chars]
